ghostPage.title: Getting Started
ghostPage.excerpt:
We are confirming our blockchain technology and plan to have a final blockchain
selected by Q1-22. This section will see significant updates after that
decision. In the meantime, you can work with a basic SDK and an example client 
and test your DSNP experiments on Ethereum Rinkeby and Ropsten testnets. Weekly 
DSNP specification development meetings are recorded and posted here as well.
Questions? Ask in the Forums!

DSNP Software Development Kit

ghostPage.plaintext:
We are confirming our blockchain technology and plan to have a final blockchain
selected by Q1-22. This section will see significant updates after that
decision. In the meantime, you can work with a basic SDK and an example client 
and test your DSNP experiments on Ethereum Rinkeby and Ropsten testnets. Weekly 
DSNP specification development meetings are recorded and posted here as well.
Questions? Ask in the Forums!

DSNP Software Development Kit
The DSNP SDK is a collection of API and build components for DSNP application
development.

DSNP SDK [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/sdk-ts]DSNP Example Client
The DSNP Example Client is a social app that creates a user's DSNP identity,
posts, replies, and connections on the DSNP social graph. Using the DSNP SDK and
a provided server ('static-server'), the Example Client demonstrates DSNP's
functionality and how it can be quickly integrated. Note that the GitHub repo
linked to below also includes a troubleshooting FAQ.

The Example Client is only an example and not meant for production applications!

Example Client [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/example-client]DSNP SDK
[../dev-portal-sdk]Testnet Blockchain
DSNP is backed by a blockchain network. Having a non-production blockchain
'testnet' allows developers to test different apps without creating permanent
records. 

Our testnet is for experimentation only. Do not use it in earnest! We
periodically destroy the data and do not make any promises about reliability or
consistency.

Spin up the Example Client to use the Ethereum Rinkeby and Ropsten testnets.

Example Client [../dev-portal-example-client/]Weekly DSNP Specification Meetings 
Watch videos of weekly discussions about DSNP specification development
[https://vimeo.com/showcase/weekly-dsnp-spec-meeting], from how to resolve open
PRs [https://github.com/LibertyDSNP/spec] to new technical challenges.
ghostPage.html:
We are confirming our blockchain technology and plan to have a final blockchain selected by Q1-22. This section will see significant updates after that decision. In the meantime, you can work with a basic SDK and an example client and test your DSNP experiments on Ethereum Rinkeby and Ropsten testnets. Weekly DSNP specification development meetings are recorded and posted here as well. Questions? Ask in the Forums!

DSNP Software Development Kit

The DSNP SDK is a collection of API and build components for DSNP application development.

DSNP SDK

DSNP Example Client

The DSNP Example Client is a social app that creates a user's DSNP identity, posts, replies, and connections on the DSNP social graph. Using the DSNP SDK and a provided server ('static-server'), the Example Client demonstrates DSNP's functionality and how it can be quickly integrated. Note that the GitHub repo linked to below also includes a troubleshooting FAQ.

The Example Client is only an example and not meant for production applications!

Example Client DSNP SDK

Testnet Blockchain

DSNP is backed by a blockchain network. Having a non-production blockchain 'testnet' allows developers to test different apps without creating permanent records.

Our testnet is for experimentation only. Do not use it in earnest! We periodically destroy the data and do not make any promises about reliability or consistency.

Spin up the Example Client to use the Ethereum Rinkeby and Ropsten testnets.

Example Client

Weekly DSNP Specification Meetings

Watch videos of weekly discussions about DSNP specification development, from how to resolve open PRs to new technical challenges.
